menu.typeCheck.desc: Learn about your tendencies and learning style
menu.chatbot.desc: Feel free to ask any questions you have

chatbot.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.
chatbot.response1: Yes, please tell me. I'll help you.
chatbot.response2: That's an interesting story. Could you tell me more details?
chatbot.response3: I see. Let me make a suggestion that might help.
chatbot.response4: That's a good question. Shall we think about it together?

chat.greeting: Hello! I'm a CS support chatbot.
chat.welcomeMessage: Feel free to ask any questions about your studies or if you have any concerns!

quickReplies.question: What kind of help do you need?
quickReplies.study.message: I would like to ask questions or get advice about studying.
quickReplies.technical.message: I want to inquire about technical issues or usage.
